Hi, I'm Yuan Zheng.

I'm a UX & Product Designer interested in promoting scientific literacy through UI / UX design. I have over 5 years research experience on studying biomedical science . I was a Ph.D. candidate in University of Minnesota where I got six published papers as first / (co-) author. In my free time, I like dancing and sniffing my cat !

"My passion for ux design lies in bridging the gap between science and our society."
